name: Move method to different class (C#)
prompt:
In the C# project, move the `Abs` method from src/Math.cs (MathModule class) to src/Utils.cs (UtilsModule class). Make it a public method in UtilsModule.

Steps:
1. Remove the Abs method from MathModule in src/Math.cs
2. Add it to UtilsModule in src/Utils.cs
3. Update the caller `Distance` in MathModule to call the moved method

The contract comment `// Postcondition: result >= 0` must be preserved with the moved method.
